Korean: 회의에 참여해 주신 모든 분들께 감사드립니다.
English: Thank you everyone for joining the call.
Is anyone else joining the call?
Is everyone on the line?
John, are you on?

Korean: 아쉽게도 Mr.김은 오늘 참석하지 않으실 거예요.
English: Unfortunately, Mr.Kim won’t be joining us today.

Korean: 오늘은 Mr.김이 참석할 수 없을 것 같습니다.
English: I’m afraid Mr.Kim can’t be with us today.
John can you go on mute?
Can you put yourself on mute?

Korean: 수잔, 음소거를 해제해 주실 수 있나요?
English: Susan, could you unmute yourself?

Korean: 수잔, 당신은 음소거 상태일 수도 있습니다
English: Susan, you may/might be on mute

Korean: 수잔, 안 들려요. 음소거 상태인지 확인할 수 있나요?
English: Susan I can't hear you. Can you see if you're on mute?
I’m sorry, but I need to jump on another call.

Korean: 죄송해요. 다른 회의에 참석해야겠어요. 곧 다시 얘기하겠습니다.
English: Sorry, I gotta hop on another call. We’ll talk again soon.

Korean: 수잔, 소리가 끊겨서 들려요. 연결 상태를 확인할 수 있나요?
English: Susan, you're breaking up. Can you check your connection?
Am I still breaking up?

Korean: 톰, 잠시 연결이 끊어졌어요. 다시 말씀해 주시겠어요?
English: Tom, we lost you for a minute. Can you say that again?
Sorry, I just got cut off.
Can you share the link in the chat (box)?

Korean: 질문이나 의견이 있으시면 채팅(창)에 자유롭게 입력해 주세요.
English: If you have any questions or comments, feel free to type them in the chat (box).
Just a moment. Let me pull up the slides.
Just a second. It's still loading.
Can I jump in here for a second?
Feel free to jump in with any questions or comments.
Sorry to jump in.
